Title: Authorizes the Lower East Side Ecology Center to use the East River Compost Yard and Fire Boat House
Summary: Authorizes the Lower East Side Ecology Center to use the East River Compost Yard and Fire Boat House located within the East River Park for the purposes of running a community compost site and community education programs.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Lower East Side Ecology Center to use the East River Compost Yard and Fire Boat House
